parameters.text:
=Review the following weekly notes from {{ $('Calculate Month Details').first().json.monthName }} {{ $('Calculate Month Details').first().json.year }} and create a structured monthly summary.

WEEKLY NOTES:
{{ $json.stdout }}

Create a monthly summary with these sections:

# Monthly Summary: {{ $('Calculate Month Details').first().json.monthName }} {{ $('Calculate Month Details').first().json.year }}

## Overview
(2-3 sentences summarizing the month)

## Key Accomplishments
(Bullet list of major wins and completed projects)

## Work Highlights
(Important work projects, deployments, and achievements)

## Personal & Homelab
(Personal projects, learning, and homelab improvements)

## Challenges & Learnings
(Issues faced, lessons learned, areas for improvement)

## Metrics
- Weeks tracked: {{ $('Parse Weekly Note Files').first().json.fileCount }}
- PTO days: (count from notes)
- Major projects: (count significant items)

## Looking Ahead
(Carry-over items and focus for next month)

Be specific, use actual project names and details from the notes. Focus on meaningful accomplishments.
